definition[0]: one of the main characters in the humorous US television programme from the 1970s called All in the Family. Archie Bunker is a working-class man who is very proud of being American, always thinks that he is right, and believes that foreign people should not be allowed to live in the US because they will change it too much. People sometimes use ‘Archie Bunker’ as a name for anyone who has similar strong opinions.
